# AVVideoCompositionRenderHint

**Class**

Information about upcoming composition requests, such as composition start time and end time.

## Declaration

```swift
class AVVideoCompositionRenderHint
```

## Managing composition timing

- **startCompositionTime**: The start time of the upcoming composition requests.
- **endCompositionTime**: The end time of the upcoming composition requests.

## Preparing to render frames

- **anticipateRendering(using:)**: Informs a custom video compositor about upcoming rendering requests.
- **prerollForRendering(using:)**: Tells a custom video compositor to perform any work in the prerolling phase.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
